name: ThenPCIInfoIsDisplayedOnFAQPage
description: Verify that info related to PCI is displayed on FAQ page
aliases: Then verify that information related to PCI is displayed on FAQ page
children: When I click on element FAQSectionModule.TopicsDropdown
Then information related to selected topic is displayed with [selectedTopic=FAQ_PROGRAMA_PROTECTION_PLUS]
When I click on element FAQSectionModule.TopicsDropdown
Then information related to selected topic is displayed with [selectedTopic=FAQ_STANDARD_PCI_DSS]
When I click on element FAQSectionModule.TopicsDropdown
Then information related to selected topic is displayed with [selectedTopic=FAQ_QUESTIONARIO_SEMPLIFICATO]
